name: Julia Child
description: Julia Child - With over 50 years of culinary experience, Julia Child is a household name in American cooking. She is best known for introducing French cuisine to American audiences through her books and TV shows, and has won numerous awards for her contributions to the culinary world.

recipes.recipeName: Shorshe Ilish (Hilsa Fish with Mustard Curry)
recipes.description: Shorshe Ilish is a dish consisting of hilsa fish cooked in savory mustard gravy, commonly served with white rice for a hearty, must-try meal.
‘Kacchi‘ means ‘raw’ in English. Unlike most other types of Biriyani, the meat used in this dish is first marinated with spices and placed at the bottom of the cooking pot uncooked.

Kala Bhuna gets its name from its appearance, as ‘kala’ means ‘black‘. The meat – which can be beef or mutton – is cooked with a long list of traditional spices and yogurt. It is cooked for much longer than in other curries, which gives the meat a blackish hue. It also tastes different than regular beef curry.

recipes.recipeName: Bhuna Khichuri with Dim Bhaji (Yellow Rice with Omelette)
recipes.description: Khichuri, also known as Khichdi in India, is made with rice and lentils and is yellow in color. The rice and lentils are washed thoroughly and cooked with a few spices, turmeric, and ghee.
Sheek kebab is a dish of ground beef or mutton, mixed with spice, that is skewered and then roasted over hot coals. In Bangladesh, the meat is best served tender, with a slight outer charring.
A dish dating back generations, fuchka, also known as pani-puri in India, are small, round shells with a sticky filling. You can eat a singular fuchka in one bite.

name: Gordon Ramsay
description: Gordon Ramsay - Known for his fiery personality and Michelin-starred restaurants, Gordon Ramsay is one of the most successful chefs in the world. He has also hosted several popular TV shows, including Hell's Kitchen and MasterChef, and has written multiple cookbooks.

name: Jamie Oliver
description: Jamie Oliver - A British chef, restaurateur, and TV personality, Jamie Oliver is known for his focus on healthy, simple recipes. He has hosted several cooking shows, including The Naked Chef, and has also authored numerous cookbooks and started his own foundation to promote healthy eating in schools.

name: Maggie Beer
description: Maggie Beer - A renowned Australian chef and television personality, Maggie Beer is known for her passion for regional Australian cuisine and her use of seasonal, locally-sourced ingredients. She has hosted several cooking shows, and has also authored multiple cookbooks and established her own food and wine production company.

name: Ina Garten
description: Ina Garten - Known as the Barefoot Contessa, Ina Garten is an American chef and TV personality who is famous for her elegant and simple approach to cooking. She has authored multiple cookbooks, hosted several cooking shows, and runs a specialty food store in the Hamptons.

name: Massimo Bottura
description: Massimo Bottura - An Italian chef and restaurateur, Massimo Bottura is known for his innovative approach to traditional Italian cuisine. He has been awarded multiple Michelin stars and has topped the list of the World's 50 Best Restaurants, and has also written a cookbook and started a non-profit organization to promote sustainable food practices.
